alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 5:08AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma affecting Sumter, Dooly and Macon Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Lovejoy, Peachtree City, Fayetteville, Americus, Peachtree City, Woolsey, Sharpsburg, Peachtree City, Peachtree City, Senioa, Griffin, Griffin, Orchard Hill, Molena, Thomaston, Carsonville, Montezuma, Byromville... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 25 feet, Flooding of auto store at west end of Highway 26 and 49 occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.6 feet and rising slowly. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning and continue rising to a crest of 24.5 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
